summary: A smuggler rises to power in in 1970s Mumbai, a younger gangster seeks to overthrow him and a police officer is caught in the middle.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Emraan Hashmi|Kangana Ranaut|Prachi Desai|Randeep Hooda|Naved Aslam|Sanjeev Wilson|Allauddin Khan|Rajeev Yadav|Sushil Pandey|Mehul Bhojak|Anjum Sharma|Dheerendra Dwivedi|Sumit Kaul|Ravi Khanvilkar|Chandrakant Taneja|Asif Hussain|Hemant Choudhary|Vikas Shrivastav|Asif Basra|Avtar Gill|Pankaj Sharma|Dinkar Gavande|Gyan Prakash|Prithvi Zutshi|Tarang Nehra|Rakesh Biduwa|Krishna Raaz|Meenal Patel|Anuj Tikku|Payal Nair|Pradip Sagar|Imran Hasnee|Anamika Benn|Amy Kingston|Sanjay Roy|Mahendra Shrivas|Sanjay Kulkarni|Dhanlaxmi|Prashant Barot|Resham Arora|Ratan Lal|Madhuri Bedekar|Raaj Gopal Iyer|Kamal Adeep|Rohit Pathak|Tareeq|Anand Alkunte|Krishna Choudhary|Kamal Adib|Varun Bagri|Herbie Crasto|Namit Dahiya|Gauhar Khan|Arbaaz Ali Khan
title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai
